content.html: I’ve really gotta hand it to you, I don’t think I’ve ever seen a company throw out a blog post saying “Here’s our new employee he’s a cop and has used our product to spy on people for years.”, it’s a glowing endorsement. Definitely going to entice people to buy your computers
